Row.Text: From the upper Nile rise the Nubians. Great architects build grand temples, while humble farmers irrigate crops. A well fed population will drive innovation, and the Nubians know this well. Grow your vast cities and the scholars will come. Will this impressive knowledge be used to educate the masses or subjugate your neigbhors?
The flow of the river is constantly changing, but the Nubian presence is a constant. Rise with the water, and history will remember you.
Alliances are key to Nubia's strategy, so keep those relationships friendly and manage your Influence wisely on Endeavors.
